name: Covert PSN Destruction Strategies
description: Applying stealth-based methods to dismantle PSN influence without direct confrontation.

cards.title: Financial Disruptions to PSN Operations
cards.description: Cutting off the financial pipelines that keep PSNs operational.
bulletpoints: Identifying hidden financial assets and offshore accounts.
Using economic pressure to force compliance or collapse.
Leveraging regulatory loopholes to create legal roadblocks.

cards.title: Legal Entrapment and Exposure Tactics
cards.description: Using the law against PSNs to remove them from positions of influence.
bulletpoints: Exposing illegal financial transactions and regulatory violations.
Documenting criminal activity for legal intervention.
Creating whistleblower protections to encourage internal betrayals.

cards.title: Destabilizing PSN Internal Cohesion
cards.description: Using controlled disruptions to weaken PSN alliances and coordination.
bulletpoints: Orchestrating controlled disinformation to break internal trust.
Encouraging infighting between different PSN factions.
